BushTripInjector.ChangeLog:
0.7.0.931 Feature: Select the Parkingspot inside of BTI. To activate this feature, you must download the Database File for the Parking Positions seperatly from Flightsim.to BTI will calculate Position and Heading for you.
0.7.1.955 User-Req: Enable/Disable loading the flightplan into GPS (Koschi) Feature: Allow Multi-Actions in Events&Triggers Editor Feature: Activate sound files in Events&Triggers (incl. a warning message because of sim bug) GUI: some typos (thanks to Pennsocke) Maint: Parking Database included into UpdateCheck Maint: Context Menu in WorldMap for future features FIX: Fixed a bug when calculating runway heading (true/magnetic), when airport is not in BTI database (cptdev)
